code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import Playlist from"./playlist";import{openModal as _openModal,closeModal as _closeModal}from"../../../actions/modal_actions";import{fetchUserPlaylists as _fetchUserPlaylists,removePlaylist as _removePlaylist,renamePlaylist as _renamePlaylist}from"../../../actions/playlist_actions";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{playlists:state.entities.playlist,currentUserId:state.session.user.id};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{openModal:function openModal(modal){return dispatch(_openModal(modal));},closeModal:function closeModal(){return dispatch(_closeModal());},fetchUserPlaylists:function fetchUserPlaylists(userId){return dispatch(_fetchUserPlaylists(userId));},removePlaylist:function removePlaylist(playlistData){return dispatch(_removePlaylist(playlistData));},renamePlaylist:function renamePlaylist(playlistData){return dispatch(_renamePlaylist(playlistData));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Playlist);
